title: Coffee for a Cause
location: Creative Cup Coffee, Spring Lake, NJ
description: Sip great coffee and support a cause that matters—come hang out and make a difference with us! Join us in person for Coffee for a Cause –20% of Creative Cup sales benefit the Rae of Light Foundation. Shop our vendors to give back more!
blurb: Sip great coffee and support a cause that matters—come hang out and make a difference with us!

title: Hillside Warehouse Volunteering
description: Sort food, assemble food boxes, pack pasta, or prep food to be distributed to network partners and members of the community in our Hillside warehouse. Volunteers will be assigned to specific activities upon arrival. Volunteers must be at least 12 years old (12-15 must be accompanied by an adult).
blurb: Sort food, assemble food boxes, pack pasta, or prep food to be distributed to network partners and members of the community in our Hillside warehouse. Volunteers will be assigned to specific activities upon arrival.
